programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La grande chasse aux oeufs de Pâques) S1 (18/26)
programme.desc: «La grande chasse aux oeufs de Pâques»It's Adventure Bay's annual Easter Egg hunt and the pups are helping Mayor Goodway with the egg decorating. The hunt for a very special egg leads Ryder and the Paw Patrol on an exciting adventure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le printemps) S3 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le printemps»Papy Cochon organise une chasse aux oeufs en chocolat pour Peppa et ses amis. Mais les tout-petits sont tristes quand ils ne trouvent pas les friandises. Grand-père et grand-mère Cochon leur montrent alors les poussins dans le jardin...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le poisson-lapin) S3 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le poisson-lapin»It's time for baby animals! Goby dreams up the Oyster Bunny, a mysterious character who loves baby animals. Can the Guppies follow an egg trail to find the elusive Oyster Bunny? A tasty treat awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Zeg et l'oeuf) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Zeg et l'oeuf»While playing Begg, Zegg's favorite game, the Monster Wheels find the egg of a Truckadactylus. The Monster Wheels do everything they can to return the egg to the nest as soon as possible.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La course rigolote) S3 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La course rigolote»Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La Lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La Lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Galaxie Gourmet) S6 (n°617)
programme.desc: «Galaxie Gourmet»In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le pinceau magique) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le pinceau magique»When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout»Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Flow Bros) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Flow Bros»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré) S1 (3/21)
programme.desc: «Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré»When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'oison / La course en Montgolfière) S1 (5/26)
programme.desc: «L'oison / La course en Montgolfière»"105A PUP PUP GOOSE Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling named ""Fuzzy"" takes a liking to him. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to figure out a way to get Fuzzy to join his flock when they fly south, because he won't leave Marshal! 105B - PUP, PUP AND AWAY When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!".

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La cueillette de Paddington) S2 (9/27)
programme.desc: «La cueillette de Paddington»Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»It is amazing what Grandpa Dog provides everyone within his garage. And fortunately, otherwise you have bad luck with your bad luck as a breakdown! But when something goes wrong with the new car wash, Papa Pig suddenly turns out to be the great savior.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa and her family are at the school fête. The top prize in the raffle is a trip in a Hot Air Balloon. Peppa wins! Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb into the balloon. Everyone enjoys the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cirque / Un sacré charivari) S1 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Le cirque / Un sacré charivari»107A - PUPS SAVE THE CIRCUS Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to find her! In the meantime Ellie's Mom goes looking for her. Now there are two Elephants loose in Adventure Bay! 107B - PUP A DOODLE DO Mayor Goodway's purse chicken "Chickaletta" has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search adventure bay for the prized poulet and finally rescue Chickaletta and return her to the Mayor.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steel Antlers / Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Steel Antlers / Berry Bad»Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La danse des algues / Dans sa bulle) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «La danse des algues / Dans sa bulle»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Peppa loses her shoes. She's getting new red shoes. She's so happy she doesn't want to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hiccups) S1 (n°40)
programme.desc: «Hiccups»Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Betsy la tondeuse) S2 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Betsy la tondeuse»Papa Pig waited a long time to mow the lawn. It's fun to play in at first, but when Peppa and George loose their ball in it, they call Grandpa Pig. And Betsy, the super lawn mower, will take that!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse aux oeufs) S2 (18/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse aux oeufs»Paddington and the Egg Hunt: Can Sofia make Windsor Gardens' biggest ever omelette? Only if Paddington can replace some cracked eggs in time. (S2, ep 18a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Ruben-o-saurus) S2 (26/26)
programme.desc: «Le Ruben-o-saurus»"The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les bébés autruches) S6 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Les bébés autruches»Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'oeuf de Galinetta) S6 (8/26)
programme.desc: «L'oeuf de Galinetta»Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des lapins affamés) S1 (13/26)
programme.desc: «Des lapins affamés»Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La grande chasse aux oeufs de Pâques) S1 (18/26)
programme.desc: «La grande chasse aux oeufs de Pâques»It's Adventure Bay's annual Easter Egg hunt and the pups are helping Mayor Goodway with the egg decorating. The hunt for a very special egg leads Ryder and the Paw Patrol on an exciting adventure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le printemps) S3 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le printemps»Papy Cochon organise une chasse aux oeufs en chocolat pour Peppa et ses amis. Mais les tout-petits sont tristes quand ils ne trouvent pas les friandises. Grand-père et grand-mère Cochon leur montrent alors les poussins dans le jardin...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le poisson-lapin) S3 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le poisson-lapin»It's time for baby animals! Goby dreams up the Oyster Bunny, a mysterious character who loves baby animals. Can the Guppies follow an egg trail to find the elusive Oyster Bunny? A tasty treat awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Zeg et l'oeuf) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Zeg et l'oeuf»While playing Begg, Zegg's favorite game, the Monster Wheels find the egg of a Truckadactylus. The Monster Wheels do everything they can to return the egg to the nest as soon as possible.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard le lapin vient jouer) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard le lapin vient jouer»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La course rigolote) S3 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La course rigolote»Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La Lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La Lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Galaxie Gourmet) S6 (n°617)
programme.desc: «Galaxie Gourmet»In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le pinceau magique) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le pinceau magique»When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue et le Carton Passe-Partout»Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Flow Bros) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Flow Bros»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré) S1 (3/21)
programme.desc: «Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré»When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'oison / La course en Montgolfière) S1 (5/26)
programme.desc: «L'oison / La course en Montgolfière»"105A PUP PUP GOOSE Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling named ""Fuzzy"" takes a liking to him. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to figure out a way to get Fuzzy to join his flock when they fly south, because he won't leave Marshal! 105B - PUP, PUP AND AWAY When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!".

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La cueillette de Paddington) S2 (9/27)
programme.desc: «La cueillette de Paddington»Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des Manchots en Détresse / Le Bébé Dauphin) S2 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des Manchots en Détresse / Le Bébé Dauphin»Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it's up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une vie de star / Méchant Hank) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Une vie de star / Méchant Hank»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pas très bien) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les histoires fantastiques de Blaze) S5 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les histoires fantastiques de Blaze»Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Chicken Circus!) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Chicken Circus!»Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!
